titles.title: A bill requiring the President to take retaliatory action against foreign barriers and restrictions that unfairly limit United States trade.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Requires the President, if a foreign nation is applying a tariff or non-tariff barrier that is unduly burdening and restricting U.S. foreign trade, to: (1) apply a barrier similar in kind to that applied by the foreign nation and applicable to a similar product or service; and (2) take equivalent retaliatory action that affects goods or services, or both, of the foreign country.
